rooms.description: Vastu-optimized entrance hall with north-eastern alignment for positive energy. Minimalistic, functional design and cost-effective materials.
Open-concept living area adjacent to the entrance. Large windows facing east to receive morning sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
Functional kitchen with south-eastern alignment to harness energy, equipped with essential modern amenities and energy-efficient design.
Compact dining space integrated within the living area. Placed in central location to maintain balance.
Corner swimming pool designed with cost-effective materials, ensuring natural light and ventilation as per local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance placed to invite positive energy and adhere to Vastu guidelines.
Large windows in the east wall to maximize morning sunlight. Cost-effective installation with insulated glass.
Doors between living areas and kitchen using cost-effective materials ensuring easy navigation.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with south-western alignment for privacy and calm, featuring built-in storage to reduce costs.
Secondary bedroom adjacent to the master suite. Simple design with essential amenities.
Third bedroom with north-eastern alignment ensuring positive energy flow according to Vastu principles.
Master bathroom designed for relaxation, placed next to master bedroom following Vastu recommendations.
Shared guest bathroom accessible from common areas. Compact design with essential fixtures.

openings.description: Balcony extending from master bedroom for ventilation and scenic view, designed to be cost-effective.
Windows placed strategically in bedrooms to allow morning sunlight while preserving privacy and reducing energy costs.
